name: USER
description: Users can access and buy products, write reviews, edit their profile, but cannot add or modify a product

name: CARRIER
description: Carriers can only access orders, user address info

name: SUPPORT
description: Supports can access, modify user reviews, respond to questions and chat with users

name: MANAGER
description: Managers can access, modify products, edit reviews, but cannot access and modify user profiles

name: ADMIN
description: Admins can access, modify products, reviews, user profiles, make changes to the database in needed
